description: From Latin cancer (“crab”) + -īnus, as if from *cancrīnus. The poetry sense comes from the fact that most species of crab can walk sideways, either left or right.

adjectives.description: cancrine (comparative more cancrine, superlative most cancrine)

entries.meaning: (poetry) Palindromic; reading the same forwards or backwards.
(by extension) Of or pertaining to reading something backwards.
